attributes.action: pay carers from the date they start caring
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 13th February 2007 I went on SSP to care for my husband who had been diagnosed with terminal cancer.  Because I had been paid for part of February, I could not qualify for carers allowance as I was advised that the pay I received during February had to support me and my husband during March.  Why???  How many employers pay one month in advance? My husband died on 2nd April and I was awarded £46 allowance for the week he died.  This has now been taken off me as, 3 months after he died, I have been granted widows pension.  Also, £46 is less than the minimum wage - why?
